message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1400000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be at $1350000 to make it worth my while. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
